thread.section_title: Animal Rights Petitions. End Cruelty and Exploitation
thread.title: Make it a offence to chain and tether a dog in Ireland
thread.title_full: Make it a offence to chain and tether a dog in Ireland

title: Make it a offence to chain and tether a dog in Ireland
text:
by: tina adams target: Local councillors , TD's , Ministers 
It is not an offence or against the law to chain and tether dogs in Ireland, this has to be included in Irish Animal Welfare legislation . Justice for dogs who spend there whole life chained as " Yard Dogs" there is no place for this barbaric practice in modern society .
